item.title: Illegal start of experssion
item.dc:creator: @polkaman polkaman
item.description:
@polkaman wrote:

I’ve no joke been stuck on this noobiest problem ever for two hours

src\server\model\shops\ShopAssistant.java:584: illegal start of expression public void openSkillCape() { ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

Did I miss a bracket somewhere or something? Here’s the code surrounding it

c.sendMessage("You do not have enough Slayer points to buy this item."); } } public void openSkillCape() { int capes = get99Count(); if (capes > 1) capes = 1; else capes = 0; c.myShopId = 14; setupSkillCapes(capes, get99Count()); } 
	/*public int[][] skillCapes = {{0,9747,4319,2679},{1,2683,4329,2685},{2,2680,4359,2682},{3,2701,4341,2703},{4,2686,4351,2688},{5,2689,4347,2691},{6,2692,4343,2691},</blockquote>

Thanks for reading :3 help pls

Read full topic
